info.name: Chronology
info.attribution:
Board layout by ArnoldSmith86. Released to public domain under CC0.

The library image was generated by Midjourney using the prompt "events on a timeline, water color painting". The background image using prompt "time vortex, water color painting --ar 16:10". The card images using prompts "*, pencil drawing on parchment --ar 2:3".

Texts were generated by ChatGPT.
info.description: Dive into the captivating world of history. Draw event cards and place them in precise chronological order. Sharpen your historical knowledge, make strategic choices, and emerge victorious by mastering the intricate tapestry of the past.
info.similarAwards: 2012 Årets Spel Best Adult Game Winner
info.ruleText:
📜 Setup:

  1. Every player takes a seat.
  2. Press restart_alt to shuffle the cards and deal a hand to each player.

🎮 Gameplay:

  1. On your turn, choose a card from your hand and decide where it fits on the timeline in the middle.
  2. Place your chosen card face down in the appropriate spot and reveal the date side by clicking it.
    • If placed correctly, the card stays on the timeline, and your turn ends.
    • If placed incorrectly, discard the card to the holder under the timeline and draw a new one from the deck above it.
  3. Play then passes to the next player clockwise.

⌛ Winning the Game:

The first player to successfully play all of their cards in the correct chronological order wins the game! 🎉
